workshoptitle: DBA Essentials - Manage Schema Objects in Oracle Database 21c

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Set up Compute Instance
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Initialize Environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Manage Table using Database Actions
tutorials.description: How to manage tables using Database Actions.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Manage indexes and views using Database Actions
tutorials.description: How to view and create indexes and views in Database Actions.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Manage Program code stored in the database using Database Actions
tutorials.description: How to manage Program code in Oracle Database from Database Actions.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
